lead_paragraph: SAWITSKY--Arthur, MD. 1/31/1916 - 5/28/2009. Happy 100th Birthday! Extraordinary father, husband, friend, physician. We wish you were here to celebrate with us. We love and miss you every day and carry you in our hearts. Love, B, KHALEM 1/3
